item.title: About Eric Peña
item.description: 1 This is Eric Peña speaking. I am the Director of Data Science at Devoted Health, using data science and machine learning to help fix America’s health care system. Previously, I was Director of Data Science at the Kenyan startup BRCK, cofounded Yonder, created the data science podcast Partially Derivative, was the Director of Data Science at the humanitarian non-profit Ushahidi, and was the director of the low-resource technology governance project at FrontlineSMS.
